overview:
Luis Started his first company back in 2006. He loves to walk different paths and to discover some others. Passionate about design

The brand was born in the middle of 2006, in Bogota-Colombia. Since the time I was studying to obtain my bachelorâ€™s degree on industrial design, I had always have an enormous interest in screen printing techniques and its possibilities. By the time I got my bachelorâ€™s degree I decided to move on with the idea -driven by passion- I had in mind for a couple of years. Finally I was giving the step to design and produce some t-shirts, caps and put them out there in the market. That was one of the biggest decisions I made for my life because it makes me realize that this was something I wanted to do for the rest of my days. I decided to mix some of my passions. Back in 2006 some friend of mine introduced me to Ultimate Frisbeeâ€¦ it was something like love at first sight; it was the perfect excuse for me to give life to the brand. Brand beginnings were like a hobby, everything started small and suddendly grow bigger, things begun to move faster we had people coming into our website asking for products and here we are 3 years after, still rocking the market loving what we do. We feel proud for the things weâ€™ve done so far we know thereâ€™s a long and hard road to walk, but here we are facing everyday giants and giving every positive thing we have to satisfy our fans.
